meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sara-Jane Whitaker Gavin Borchert Kelly Lasiter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7573.

td.p: Sara-Jane Whitaker, an office clerk from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Gavin Borchert, a writer and editor from Seattle, Washington
Kelly Lasiter, an administrative assistant from Granite City, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,800)

tr.td: WHERE AM I?
BIG & SMALL SCREEN DOCTORS
THOREAU-ING A 200th BIRTHDAY!
(Alex: In honor of Henry David Thoreau's birthday today.)
A PODCAST OF CHARACTERS
GIVE ME 5 "CC"s
STAT!

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Kelly: What is Ho Chi Minh City?)

Hanoi

Kelly
Triple Stumper
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
